review: My Apple TV has been great for one and a half years.  Then whamm, it went black, quit working.  So I am going with Roku 3.  It has 3 essential programs I have wanted on one device ; amazon, vudu, and Netflix.  My daughter just told me I could put my itune movies on usb then watch them on roku 3 until I can find easy AND cost effective way to watch my iTunes movies.  I gave the apple tv  4 stars because when it worked it was very wonderful, clear clean picture.  I watched Netflix on Apple  instead of my  Sony  blu-ray because the picture quality was so markedly better.
author: N. Gunter

review: I use it to airplay content from my iPhone and Mac Air.  It works very well with video downloaded on my Mac Air.  Streaming video from Internet is not as smooth.  I suspect that has something to do with our internet speed.  I don't own other products similar to Apple TV.  For what I do this unit is very satisfactory.
author: Margaret S

review: Make sure you are in fact purchasing the 3rd gen.  Unfortunately I purchased this item last year and received the model number :A1378 which is the 2nd generation.For the same price you can purchase the 3rd generation that is model number: A1427 or A1469.Double check the model number on the bottom of your Apple TV when you receive it to make sure you are receiving the latest model.  I never thought to look until almost 8 months later because I figured all models were the same and now i'm realizing why I can only view movies at 780p because the unit I received was in fact the 2nd gen which only supports up to 780p and the 3rd gen supports 1080p.  Love the unit regardless however I wish I knew this when ordering instead of now figuring out the difference in model's that are being sold online.
